data.title: Unworkable Ads
data.content: This app was great! However, it’s gotten to the point where it’s unusable because I keep getting an ad popup for its premium services. I am more than happy with the free version and I don’t mind seeing ads or having limited access to content. However, the ad pop-up for the premium version refuses to go away, making all of its features inaccessible. Every-time I close the ad, less than a second later it pops right back up and the cycle continues. Such a shame.

data.title: Add Liquid Glass!!
data.content:
Really dig this app. I’ve had the app for years! It’s a helpful reminder for what I need to focus on. 

Now that iOS26 is out, can you PLEASE add an option that allows for the widget to be clear and transparent with a Liquid Glass effect. That would be so sick and seamlessly go with the new update and any backgrounds I have.

data.title: Love the reminders

BIG thanks to the folks who developed this app. and the folks who constantly keep it updated with new & refreshing content! ☮️

data.title: Way too complex
data.content: I was looking for a customizable daily affirmations app.  This one asked an excessive set of start up questions - I felt like I was applying for a mortgage after hitting skip about twenty times.  I wanted a simple beautiful interface and repeatable affirmations not a gantlet that ruined my peace.

data.title: great affirmations, annoying notifs

data.content: I was charged $14.99 even though I only signed up for the free trial. I do not see any way of getting my money back. This app is a very shady.

data.title: Highly Recommend
data.content: I am not a bot! I really like this app😭 and if you were a friend or loved one of mine I would pitch this to you for your OWN benefit. We are in this journey of self improvement together and there is nothing you would be able to do about that😌 Now, for my demure response, I use I am every day. It’s been a great tool for helping me set the tone for the day. I like that I can swipe within a specific category to read affirmations that pertain to any topic. This app even has a quality where you can create your own affirmations and revisit them using the app’s fonts and wallpapers, which adds character and personality to each message.
data.author: Karicloou

data.title: So positive and easy
data.content: I love how easy it is to navigate through this app.  And in no time I had built a positive and productive habit.  Recommended for anyone starting on a healing journey!

data.content: While this app has already helped me in the little I have used it, I do wish I could blacklist words or dismiss certain affirmations that don’t apply to me. I don’t have a supportive family and I’ve had many family-based affirmations have popped up, just to name one.

data.content:
Ok, first off really a fan. Been with you guys for a few years now and it’s been a life changer! Really helped me rebound from a tough spot. 

But the recent updates seem to have limited the usage? I once could practice affirmations with music playing in the background from other apps. And there was an option for voice preference which I enjoyed. The default one now feels flat. Anyway we can get these features back??

data.title: DO NOT USE THIS APP

data.title: Buggy
data.content:
I love the app. I have been using it for years, but this version seems buggy. I’m having issues where it keeps asking me to set up my Apple Watch even though I have done it. It keeps telling me I’ve changed my icon over and over again. Finally, the widget is not following the theme I have set in I Am. 

If you can fix these issues, I’ll give it four starts.

data.title: Squeezing money out of everything
data.content: This apps main feature was that it would say the affirmations out loud so you can repeat them. Now for that same feature that’s been free the whole time and is its main selling point it’s a $6 subscription on top of the app now being FULL of pop up ads for the most random slop games. Yeah deleted immediately. I’ll find something else.
data.author: NTCImages

data.title: Spy
data.content: Life has taught me that you can’t control someone’s loyalty. No matter how good you are to them ,it doesn’t mean that they will treat you the same way. I have been married to my husband for years with no idea he was cheating. Suddenly i started noticing changes in behavior, i suspected something was wrong So i confided in a friend who convinced and introduced me to an hacker. He was able to hack into my husband mobile phone to access his Text messages, Call logs, IG, browser history, deleted messages, Emails and WhatsApp remotely . It seemed as though my life was spinning out of control getting to find out he has someone else. I filed for a divorce just could not continue with his lies. If you feel you have been exploited in your marriage and you need proof. I suggest you contact Wayne Victor on his gmail and thank me later , he’s into any hacking related issues and can solve all hacking problem expertvictor05 @ gmail.com
data.author: Shahs/12

data.content: Man, this app is incredibly buggy. I mean, even when you close the app it runs for a few extra seconds. Tends to freeze up. Terrible.

data.content: After over 2 years as a subscriber I dropped my subscription. I consider it a waste of money to have to jump trough hoops daily to get a simple once an hour notification.

data.content: I used to loooove this app and I just recently decided to redownload it to get myself back on track only to find out that all of the fun, cute parts of this app are now blocked under a subscription paywall. Sad. At least there used to be a few free options but I can’t find any now :/

data.title: I am
data.content: It is so good it’s helping me with not having that much anxiety anymore. If you have, if you have been overthinking having trouble comparing your body to yourselves and if you just need somebody to give you affirmations every day, this is good for you. Everybody in my house has it Even my kids have it and they’re much older, but it really helps us. Hope you guys can get it too.

data.content: Empowering and uplifting.

data.title: Am I missing something?
data.content: I had this app a couple of years ago and I really loved it. What I loved about it was that I would get daily affirmations on my watch to help get me through the day. Recently, I’ve revisited the app, but it seems to have changed. Now I have to go into the app and scroll and like different information. I feel like I’m missing something as this is no better than scrolling on social media. Not something that I want to do.

data.title: way too many adds no
data.content: The amount of pop up ads is ridiculous. And to remove them a subscription? absolutely not id rather pay for an affirmations app for 5 bucks and have no ads

data.title: Bug
data.content: I received 5 notifications all at once about my streak. I do not wish to get these notifications, nor do I wish to partake in any “streak” by opening the app
data.author: User10397

data.title: Unacceptable
data.content:
I wanted to share some feedback about an affirmation that recently appeared in the app:

“I know that ending this is the best thing for me, even if it hurts.”

While I understand the intention behind it, the wording “ending this” can be interpreted in unsafe or harmful ways, especially since many people who use affirmation and wellness apps may already be struggling with mental health challenges. The phrase is vague and could unintentionally be read as a reference to self harm rather than healthy endings.

I thought it had to be a joke when this came up. Please remove this from your generator.
data.author: naenerbug

data.title: Took away the practice
data.content: There used to be an option where you can “practice” and it would read the affirmations to you.And now that’s no longer available.

data.title: Gives me anxiety
data.content:
Reading the affirmations are causing me anxiety. It might work for some but not me. I’m dealing with too much trauma in my life. The affirmations just make me cry. 
What’s frustrating is I can’t find where to cancel the app. I can’t handle receiving anymore messages.

data.content: Some of the affirmations and notifications are really negative… I’m confused.. aren’t this app supposed to feed positive affirmations? Instead they would say things like “I’m facing a difficult time now, but I can get through it” but no I’m not going through a hard time… what’s your deal lol they gave you prompts when you set it up, I chose manifest abundance, gratitude, and positive thinking, why are you keep feeding me negative thoughts🤦🏻‍♀️

data.title: Morning Routine
data.content: Thank you for making this app, I use it as a part of my moment reset each day to focus and declare the things that set my day. However, as a premium user, I continue to have glitches with my apple watch face. Even more, now that I have the Apple 11- it won’t even let me add the compilation. If this was fixed and I could use the full version that I am paying for, I would give it a 5.

data.title: Annoying
data.content: I understand you want to customise at the beginning but the number of questions you ask is ridiculous. Make it less. I know I can skip but it’s tooo much. I. A  just installed on iPad - makes me not want to use it. Yes, triggered but seriously - too much.

data.title: Uplifting Affirmations
data.content: I love seeing the “I Am” notifications throughout the day. They always seem to come at the perfect times. The affirmations are so positive and uplifting. I really enjoy reading them and seeing all of the beautiful, inspiring messages that “I Am” offers.

data.title: Confidence
data.content: It makes me more confident ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️💫

data.content: I feel more confident in myself and, I truly love myself a lot more and, I’ve had this app for 1 minute and I already feel good! (Not Ai)
data.author: AmeliaLuv7

data.title: Too many interruptions
data.content: I love this app and regularly use it. What ruins it for me are the constant reminders - not wanted or needed - that I can add an affirmation to my favourites. As I’m a long time user and using my favourites list anyway, this is unnecessary, jarring & irritating. I’d love an option to remove unwanted notifications. Or send them once only. Once is plenty.
data.author: Tired mum needs rest!

data.title: Instant healing
data.content: I’ve been to many therapists and spoken to many about my problems and struggles. No one has ever been able to help me. Shortly after downloading this app, it has worked INSTANTLY! Tailored to my own settings, it gives me the peace and calm to clear my mind in order to medicate and absorb the affirmations for the day. Very thankful I have found this app and will definitely be using it!
